      • obstacleCollision

        protected <T extends GameObject> boolean obstacleCollision(java.lang.String direction,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<T> obstacleList)
        Checks for a collision between the object and all obstacles of one object type in an arraylist.
        Parameters:
        direction - The current direction of the object.
        obstacleList - An ArrayList of all the objects that we want to check a collsion for between this object.
